properties.Name: BondYieldToCall
properties.Description:
The yield of a bond or note if you were to buy and hold the security until the call date. 

This yield is valid only if the security is called prior to maturity and is based upon the associated call date.

The calculation of yield to call is based on the coupon rate, the length of time to the call date, and the market price.

Note:
Yield to maturity and yield to call take into account the value of the discount or premium paid for the bond, and as such they offer a much better indication of the value of the bond.

Columns.Name: BondId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Product.

Columns.Name: CallDate
Columns.Description: The call date for which the yield to call is calculated.

Columns.Name: YieldToCallPercentage

Properties.Description:
The yield of a bond or note if you were to buy and hold the security until the call date. 

This yield is valid only if the security is called prior to maturity and is based upon the associated call date.

The calculation of yield to call is based on the coupon rate, the length of time to the call date, and the market price.

Note:
Yield to maturity and yield to call take into account the value of the discount or premium paid for the bond, and as such they offer a much better indication of the value of the bond.
